mapper.sql: select id, accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, short_term_flag, guaranteed_cost_rate, investment_return_rate, dividend_ratio, fund_cost_rate_t0, fund_cost_rate_t1, fund_cost_rate_t2, fund_cost_rate_t3, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del from t_base_dividend_fund_cost_rate
mapper.select: where actuarial_code = #{actuarialCode} and accounting_period = #{accountingPeriod} and is_del = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into t_base_dividend_fund_cost_rate
accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, short_term_flag, guaranteed_cost_rate, investment_return_rate, dividend_ratio, fund_cost_rate_t0, fund_cost_rate_t1, fund_cost_rate_t2, fund_cost_rate_t3, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del
#{accountingPeriod}, #{actuarialCode}, #{businessCode}, #{productName}, #{shortTermFlag}, #{guaranteedCostRate}, #{investmentReturnRate}, #{dividendRatio}, #{fundCostRateT0}, #{fundCostRateT1}, #{fundCostRateT2}, #{fundCostRateT3}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, 0
mapper.update: update t_base_dividend_fund_cost_rate set is_del = 1 where id = #{id}

#{id}
